original_text: a robust and autonomous device designed for a single purpose: maintain the oil level and activate an alarm in case of problems. It does not have any digital communication interface. Its configuration is fixed, with pre-set reaction and alarm times in the factory to cover most standard applications. The only interaction with the outside is the clean contact of the alarm relay, which can be connected to a light, a siren or the compressor control system to stop it in an emergency. Its strength lies in its simplicity: it is easy to install, it doesn't require programming and does its work reliably for years.", 'when_choose it': "When you need an economic oil level control solution, robust and completely autonomous. It is perfect for upgrading old systems, single compressors or any application where no remote monitoring or custom configuration is required. It is the ideal choice if the motto is 'simplicity and maximum reliability'.}, {'family': '_TECH16__', 'philosophy': 'Smart Local Configuration', 'main feature': 'Advanced control with configuration and wireless diagnostics through __TECH40_.', 'connectivity': 'NFC for short-range local communication with smartphone.', 'description_detailed': "The __TECH16_ represents an important step forward, introducing the flexibility of wireless configuration. While operating as an autonomous controller, it integrates NFC technology that allows technicians to interact with the unit via an app. This opens up a world of possibilities for personalization and field diagnostics. The user can finely adjust the timers to adapt the device to the specific conditions of the system, preventing false alarms. It can also read valuable diagnostic data, such as the number of times the valve has opened or the duration of alarms, helping to identify latent problems in the system.

The autonomous oil level control TK4 represents an important step forward in wireless configuration and customization. It offers a unique flexibility for the local short-range communication interface with smartphones.

metadata.chunk_title: Dispositivo di controllo del livello olio autonomo
key_concepts: Controllo avanzato con configurazione wireless tramite NFC
Interfaccia di comunicazione locale a corto raggio con smartphone
iconic_quotes: The TK4 represents an important step forward, introducing the flexibility of wireless configuration.
The user can finely adjust the timers to adapt the device to the specific plant conditions
It can also read valuable diagnostic data, such as the number of times the valve has opened

qa_pairs.question: What pressure range does TK4 support?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK4 supports a pressure of 130bar. Its Smart Local configuration allows the user to finely adjust the timers to adapt the device to the specific plant conditions.

qa_pairs.question: How do you configure the TK4?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK4 is configured using NFC technology, which allows the user to interact with the unit via an app. This opens a world of possibilities for customization and field diagnostics.

qa_pairs.question: Which refrigerant is compatible with TK4?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK4 is compatible with R134a, R404A and CO2. The user must ensure to use only compatible refrigerants to guarantee device safety and reliability.

qa_pairs.question: How do you install the TK4?
qa_pairs.answer: The TK4 is easy to install and only requires a clean connection of the alarm relay. Installation must be performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.

natural_questions: What pressure range does TK4 support?
How do you configure the TK4?
Which refrigerant is compatible with TK4?
metadata.summary: The TK4 autonomous oil level control device represents an important step forward in wireless configuration and customization. It offers unique flexibility for short-range local communication interface with smartphones.
